author: [georgeru...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115988881252246409393/)
title: Computer enchanted one of my creatures with Galvanic Arc

comments.body:
Thanks for the report, it would be very helpful if you could post a screenshot or describe the cards on the board when this occurs so that we can replicate the bad play. 

The computer has no specific knowledge of how to play Galvanic Arc or any card for that matter, what it does is to go through all possible plays and evaluate which ones have better outcomes. Thus, we need to know the exact situation in order to replicate what you've described.
